content.body: annevk: on https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/5407, it might be worth posting an update pointing to https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1065085#c72, so that future readers know the status? (the issue is locked, understandably, so I can't do it myself)
content.formatted_body: annevk: on https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/5407, it might be worth posting an update pointing to https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1065085#c72, so that future readers know the status? (the issue is locked, understandably, so I can't do it myself)

content.body: bakkot: I don't think so; there's still cross-browser agreement to remove the feature, so the spec reflects that.
content.formatted_body: bakkot: I don't think so; there's still cross-browser agreement to remove the feature, so the spec reflects that.

content.body: Individual shipping decisions are up to browsers to communicate as they wish.
